title: Lalpa hmangaihtuten
lyrics:
Lalpa hmangaihtuten,
In lawm hla rawn sa r'u;
Rilru hmun khatin lo zai r'u,
Lalthutthleng din hualin.

Zion tlangah lawn r'u,
Khawpui mawi, khawpui mawiah khian;
Zion tlang chhipah khian lawn r'u,
Lalber khawpui mawi a ni e.

Lalpa hre ngai loten
Lawm hla sak hnial mah se,
Van Lal fa duh takte zawngin,
An sa ngei tur a ni.

Zion tlang ropui chuan
Thil lawmawm a thlen e;
Van hmun ropui leh rangka chak
Kawtlai thlen hma pawhin.

Lawmin zai I rem ang,
Tin, mittui a hul ang;
Van kawtthler kan fang rual ang a,
Kan van khawpui mawiah.
